		getTypes (line 109)
	
 
	
	

Get an array of Example types which contain the specific Example  objects to collate any other details needed for reporting or  even re-performance.

	
    
				
  • return: Array of all examples of this specific type
    • 
				
  • todo: Needs refactoring to remove these duplicate methods!
    • 
				
  • access: public
    • 
			

	
	

		array
		
			getTypes
		
					(string $type)
			

	
			
    
					
  • 
				string
				$type: The PHPSpec_Runner_Example type being declared
